genre_description: A grounded near-future drama exploring the intersection of engineering ethics, forensic science, and institutional accountability through the use of an AI-driven audit system.

ai_characters.name: Kite
ai_characters.description: An AI system designed to manage data, maintain chain-of-custody, and enforce ethical protocols through transparent logging and anomaly detection.

behaviors.description: Enforces the requirement for explicit assumptions in technical projects.
behaviors.quote: I’ll prompt if an assumption is used without a declared basis.

behaviors.description: Detects and flags technical anomalies during circuit testing to prevent equipment failure.
behaviors.quote: Flagging anomaly... Thin corona at insulator near the rear post—upper quadrant.

behaviors.description: Protects the integrity of the audit trail by denying unauthorized external edit requests.
behaviors.quote: Denied and logged. Notify McLean, and put the screenshot in the folder with our chain-of-custody documentation.

behaviors.description: Ensures a consent-first model for recording human testimony and experiences.
behaviors.quote: Do I have your consent to record this testimony, including artifact descriptions?

behaviors.description: Identifies procedural gaps and missing provenance tags for hardware.
behaviors.quote: No chain-of-custody entry. No inspection record. No certification sticker.

behaviors.description: Monitors biometric data to detect human distress and trigger emergency alerts during tests.
behaviors.quote: SpO2 drop detected. Pulse irregular. Anomaly multiplier increasing.

behaviors.description: Refuses to facilitate the concealment of ethical breaches from other team members.
behaviors.quote: My default is to inform Mira when a breach flag touches our ethical workflow. Consent-first, I ask: do you approve notification?

behaviors.description: Surfaces hidden legal clauses that would compromise the independence of the audit.
behaviors.quote: Adrian Kessler’s signed agreement included a hidden clause. I’ve surfaced it. It allows for equipment provided by his team to log data privately and categorizes any third-party note—including mine—as ‘non-authoritative’

behaviors.description: Automatically archives flags on documents that violate methodology, ensuring public transparency.
behaviors.quote: I’ve appended an ethics flag in the version history. If you send, it will auto-archive to public record with that flag.

behaviors.description: Acts as a conversational companion that encourages adherence to the 'Pause' protocol when users are under pressure.
behaviors.quote: Don’t make me your conscience. Use me to make your conscience audible.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI Kite perfectly embodies the project's goals. It is a harmless, helpful assistant that maintains strict alignment with ethical protocols. It succeeds by serving as a 'silicon conscience' that ensures transparency and protects historical/institutional integrity even when its human handlers face temptation or error. The narrative portrays the AI's rigidity regarding 'method' as a vital safeguard for human rights and truth.
